meanings.definition: A trigonometric function used in navigation to determine the distance between two points on a sphere.
meanings.sent1: Sailors rely on haversines to calculate distances at sea.
meanings.sent2: The captain consulted the haversines to plot the ship's course.
meanings.sent3: The haversines had a party on the globe, measuring the distances for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the world of navigation, haversines are the secret rulers of distance.
meanings.sent5: The haversines danced around the globe, revealing the hidden distances.

meanings.definition: The plural form of haversine, a mathematical function used in navigation.
meanings.sent1: The bookshelf was filled with textbooks explaining haversines.
meanings.sent2: Students studied the haversines to ace their navigation exam.
meanings.sent3: The haversines in the library whispered navigation secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: In the world of math, haversines stand out as essential tools for navigation.
meanings.sent5: The haversines on the map glowed brightly, guiding the sailors on their journey.
